              def self.detect_rails?
        
      9.

          3

          1
          
              desc 'stop', 'Stop Rpush'
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          1
          
              option 'pid-file', type: :string, aliases: '-p'
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
              def stop
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                config_setup
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                pid = rpush_process_pid
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                return unless pid
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
          
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                STDOUT.write "* Stopping Rpush (pid #{pid})... "
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                STDOUT.flush
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                Process.kill('TERM', pid)
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                loop do
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                  begin
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                    Process.getpgid(pid)
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                    sleep 0.05
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                  rescue Errno::ESRCH
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                    break
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                  end
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                end
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
          
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                puts ANSI.green { '' }
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
              end
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
          
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          1
          
              desc 'init', 'Initialize Rpush into the current directory'
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          1
          
              option 'active-record', type: :boolean, desc: 'Install ActiveRecord migrations'
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          1
          
              def init
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                underscore_option_names
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                check_ruby_version
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                require 'rails/generators'
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
          
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                puts "* " + ANSI.green { 'Installing config...' }
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                $RPUSH_CONFIG_PATH = default_config_path # rubocop:disable Style/GlobalVars
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                Rails::Generators.invoke('rpush_config')
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
          
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                install_migrations = options['active_record']
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
          
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                unless options.key?('active_record')
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                  has_answer = false
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                  until has_answer
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                    STDOUT.write "\n* #{ANSI.green { 'Install ActiveRecord migrations?' }} [y/n]: "
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                    STDOUT.flush
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                    answer = STDIN.gets.chomp.downcase
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                    has_answer = %w(y n).include?(answer)
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                  end
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
          
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
                  install_migrations = answer == 'y'
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                end
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
          
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                Rails::Generators.invoke('rpush_migration', ['--force']) if install_migrations
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
          
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
                puts "\n* #{ANSI.green { 'Next steps:' }}"
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
                puts "  - Run 'bundle exec rake db:migrate'." if install_migrations
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                puts "  - Review and update your configuration in #{default_config_path}."
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
                puts "  - Create your first app, see https://github.com/rpush/rpush for examples."
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
                puts "  - Run 'rpush help' for commands and options."
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
              end
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
          
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          1
          
              desc 'push', 'Deliver all pending notifications and then exit'
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          1
          
              def push
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                config_setup
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
                Rpush.config.foreground = true
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
          
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
                Rpush.push
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
              end
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
          
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          1
          
              desc 'status', 'Show the internal status of the running Rpush instance.'
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          1
          
              def status
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                config_setup
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
          
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                require 'rpush/daemon'
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
                rpc = Rpush::Daemon::Rpc::Client.new(rpush_process_pid)
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                status = rpc.status
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                rpc.close
        
      102.

                puts humanize_json(status)
        
      103.

              end
        
      104.

      105.

              desc 'version', 'Print Rpush version'

          1

              def config_setup

          1
          
              def configure_rpush
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
                load_rails_environment || load_standalone
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
              end
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
          
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          1
          
              def load_rails_environment
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                if detect_rails? && options['rails_env']
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                  STDOUT.write "* Booting Rails '#{options[:rails_env]}' environment... "
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                  STDOUT.flush
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                  ENV['RAILS_ENV'] = options['rails_env']
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                  load 'config/environment.rb'
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                  Rpush.config.update(options)
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                  puts ANSI.green { '' }
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
          
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                  return true
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
                end
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
          
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
                false
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
              end
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
          
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          1
          
              def load_standalone
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
                if !File.exist?(options[:config])
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
                  STDERR.puts(ANSI.red { 'ERROR: ' } + "#{options[:config]} does not exist. Please run 'rpush init' to generate it or specify the --config option.")
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
                  exit 1
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
                else
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
                  load options[:config]
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
                  Rpush.config.update(options)
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
                end
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
              end
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
          
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          1
          
              def detect_rails?
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
                self.class.detect_rails?
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
              end
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
          
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          1
          
              def default_config_path
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
                self.class.default_config_path
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
              end
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
          
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          1
          
              def check_ruby_version
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
                STDERR.puts(ANSI.yellow { 'WARNING: ' } + "You are using an old and unsupported version of Ruby.") if RUBY_VERSION < '2.2.2' && RUBY_ENGINE == 'ruby'
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
              end
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
          
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          1
          
              def underscore_option_names
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
                # Underscore option names so that they map directly to Configuration options.
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
                new_options = options.dup
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
          
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
                options.each do |k, v|
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
                  new_k = k.to_s.tr('-', '_')
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
          
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
                  if k != new_k
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
                    new_options.delete(k)
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
                    new_options[new_k] = v
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
                  end
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
                end
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
          
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
                new_options.freeze
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
                self.options = new_options
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
              end
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
          
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          1
          
              def rpush_process_pid
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
                if Rpush.config.pid_file.blank?
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
                  STDERR.puts(ANSI.red { 'ERROR: ' } + 'config.pid_file is not set.')
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
                  exit 1
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
                end
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
          
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
                unless File.exist?(Rpush.config.pid_file)
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
                  STDERR.puts("* Rpush isn't running? #{Rpush.config.pid_file} does not exist.")
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
                  exit 1
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
                end
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
          
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
                File.read(Rpush.config.pid_file).strip.to_i
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
              end
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
          
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          1
          
              def humanize_json(node, str = '', depth = 0) # rubocop:disable Metrics/PerceivedComplexity
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
                if node.is_a?(Hash)
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
                  node = node.sort_by { |_, v| [Array, Hash].include?(v.class) ? 1 : 0 }
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
                  node.each do |k, v|
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
                    if [Array, Hash].include?(v.class)
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
                      str << "\n#{'  ' * depth}#{k}:\n"
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
                      humanize_json(v, str, depth + 1)
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
                    else
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
                      str << "#{'  ' * depth}#{k}: #{v}\n"
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
                    end
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
                  end
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
                elsif node.is_a?(Array)
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
                  node.each do |v|
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
                    str << "\n" if v.is_a?(Hash)
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
                    humanize_json(v, str, depth)
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
                  end
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
                else
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
                  str << "#{'  ' * depth}#{node}\n"
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
                end
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
          
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
                str
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
              end
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
            end
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
          end
        
      214.

                    def as_json(options = nil)

      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          1
          
                    def certificate_has_matching_private_key
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                      result = false
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                      if certificate.present?
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
                        begin
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
                          x509 = OpenSSL::X509::Certificate.new(certificate)
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                          pkey = OpenSSL::PKey::RSA.new(certificate, password)
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                          result = x509 && pkey
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                        rescue OpenSSL::OpenSSLError
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                          errors.add :certificate, 'value must contain a certificate and a private key.'
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                        end
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                      end
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                      result
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                    end
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                  end
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                end
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
              end
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
            end
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
          end
        
      38.

                    def device_token=(token)

          1
          
                    MDM_KEY = '__rpush_mdm__'
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
                    def mdm=(magic)
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                      self.data = (data || {}).merge(MDM_KEY => magic)
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                    end
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          1
          
                    MUTABLE_CONTENT_KEY = '__rpush_mutable_content__'
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          1
          
                    def mutable_content=(bool)
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                      return unless bool
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                      self.data = (data || {}).merge(MUTABLE_CONTENT_KEY => true)
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                    end
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
          
        
      41. 
      
        
    41.

                    CONTENT_AVAILABLE_KEY = '__rpush_content_available__'
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          1
          
                    def content_available=(bool)
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                      return unless bool
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                      self.data = (data || {}).merge(CONTENT_AVAILABLE_KEY => true)
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                    end
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
          
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          1
          
                    def as_json(options = nil) # rubocop:disable Metrics/AbcSize, Metrics/PerceivedComplexity
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                      json = ActiveSupport::OrderedHash.new
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
          
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                      if data && data.key?(MDM_KEY)
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                        json['mdm'] = data[MDM_KEY]
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                      else
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                        json['aps'] = ActiveSupport::OrderedHash.new
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                        json['aps']['alert'] = alert if alert
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                        json['aps']['badge'] = badge if badge
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                        json['aps']['sound'] = sound if sound
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                        json['aps']['category'] = category if category
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                        json['aps']['url-args'] = url_args if url_args
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                        json['aps']['thread-id'] = thread_id if thread_id
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
          
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                        if data && data[MUTABLE_CONTENT_KEY]
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                          json['aps']['mutable-content'] = 1
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                        end
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
          
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                        if data && data[CONTENT_AVAILABLE_KEY]
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                          json['aps']['content-available'] = 1
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                        end
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
          
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                        if data
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                          non_aps_attributes = data.reject { |k, _| k == CONTENT_AVAILABLE_KEY || k == MUTABLE_CONTENT_KEY }
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                          non_aps_attributes.each { |k, v| json[k.to_s] = v }
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                        end
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
                      end
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
          
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                      json
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
                    end
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
          
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          1
          
                    def to_binary(options = {})
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
                      frame_payload = payload
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
                      frame_id = options[:for_validation] ? 0 : send(options.fetch(:id_attribute, :id))
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                      frame = ""
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
                      frame << [1, 32, device_token].pack("cnH*")
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
                      frame << [2, frame_payload.bytesize, frame_payload].pack("cna*")
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                      frame << [3, 4, frame_id].pack("cnN")
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                      frame << [4, 4, expiry ? Time.now.to_i + expiry.to_i : 0].pack("cnN")
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                      frame << [5, 1, priority_for_frame].pack("cnc")
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                      [2, frame.bytesize].pack("cN") + frame
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                    end
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
          
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          1
          
                    private
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
          
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          1
          
                    def priority_for_frame
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
                      # It is an error to use APNS_PRIORITY_IMMEDIATE for a notification that only contains content-available.
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
                      if as_json['aps'].try(:keys) == ['content-available']
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
                        APNS_PRIORITY_CONSERVE_POWER
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                      else
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
                        priority || APNS_PRIORITY_IMMEDIATE
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                      end
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
                    end
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                  end
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                end
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
              end
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
            end
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
          end
        
      105.

    lib/rpush/client/active_model/gcm/expiry_collapse_key_mutual_inclusion_validator.rb

    11. 
          2
          
                      base.instance_eval do
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          2
          
                        validates :registration_ids, presence: true
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          2
          
                        validates :priority, inclusion: { in: GCM_PRIORITIES }, allow_nil: true
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
          
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          2
          
                        validates_with Rpush::Client::ActiveModel::PayloadDataSizeValidator, limit: 4096
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          2
          
                        validates_with Rpush::Client::ActiveModel::RegistrationIdsCountValidator, limit: 1000
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
          
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          2
          
                        validates_with Rpush::Client::ActiveModel::Gcm::ExpiryCollapseKeyMutualInclusionValidator
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                      end
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                    end
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
          
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                    # This is a hack. The schema defines `priority` to be an integer, but GCM expects a string.
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
                    # But for users of rpush to have an API they might expect (setting priority to `high`, not 10)
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
                    # we do a little conversion here.
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                    # I'm not happy about it, but this will have to do until I can take a further look.
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
                    def priority=(priority)
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                      case priority
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                        when 'high'
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                          super(GCM_PRIORITY_HIGH)
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                        when 'normal'
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                          super(GCM_PRIORITY_NORMAL)
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                        else
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                          errors.add(:priority, 'must be one of either "normal" or "high"')
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                      end
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                    end
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
          
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          1
          
                    def as_json(options = nil)
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                      json = {
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                          'registration_ids' => registration_ids,
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                          'delay_while_idle' => delay_while_idle,
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                          'data' => data
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                      }
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                      json['collapse_key'] = collapse_key if collapse_key
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                      json['content_available'] = content_available if content_available
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                      json['notification'] = notification if notification
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                      json['priority'] = priority_for_notification if priority
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                      json['time_to_live'] = expiry if expiry
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                      json
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                    end
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
          
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          1
          
                    def priority_for_notification
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                      return 'high' if priority == GCM_PRIORITY_HIGH
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                      'normal' if priority == GCM_PRIORITY_NORMAL
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                    end
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                  end
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                end
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
              end
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
            end
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
          end
        
      60.

    62.5 % covered

          1
          
              module ActiveModel
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          1
          
                class PayloadDataSizeValidator < ::ActiveModel::Validator
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          1
          
                  def validate(record)
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
                    limit = options[:limit] || 1024
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
                    return unless record.data && record.payload_data_size > limit
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
                    record.errors[:base] << "Notification payload data cannot be larger than #{limit} bytes."
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                  end

                    def alert=(alert)
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
                      if alert.is_a?(Hash)

    11. 
          
          
                        write_attribute(:alert, multi_json_dump(alert))

      14.

    16.

    17.

      18.

          1
          
                    def alert

                      string_or_json = read_attribute(:alert)
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
          
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                      if has_attribute?(:alert_is_json)
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
                        if alert_is_json?
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
                          multi_json_load(string_or_json)
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                        else
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                          string_or_json
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                        end
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                      else
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                        begin
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                          multi_json_load(string_or_json)
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                        rescue StandardError
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                          string_or_json
        
      33.

                  def data=(attrs)

                  def registration_ids=(ids)

              def update(other)
        
      65. 
      
        
    65.

      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                  other_value = other.send(attr)
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                  send("#{attr}=", other_value) unless other_value.nil?
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                end
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
              end

              def pid_file=(path)
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                if path && !Pathname.new(path).absolute?
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
                  super(File.join(Rpush.root, path))
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
                else
        
      75. 
      
        
    75.

      76.

              def client=(client)

              def redis_options=(options)
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
                Modis.redis_options = options if client == :redis
        
      98. 
      
        
    98.

      99.

          1
          
              def initialize_client
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                return if @client_initialized
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                raise ConfigurationError, 'Rpush.config.client is not set.' unless client
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
                require "rpush/client/#{client}"
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
          
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                client_module = Rpush::Client.const_get(client.to_s.camelize)
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                Rpush.send(:include, client_module) unless Rpush.ancestors.include?(client_module)
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
          
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
                [:Apns, :Gcm, :Wpns, :Wns, :Adm, :Pushy].each do |service|
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
                  Rpush.const_set(service, client_module.const_get(service)) unless Rpush.const_defined?(service)
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                end
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
          
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
                @client_initialized = true
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
              end
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
            end
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
          end
        
      116.

              def self.start
        
      78. 
      
        
    78.

      82.

      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
          
        
      85. 
      
        
    85.

      86.

      87.

      88.

              def self.shutdown
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
                if Rpush.config.foreground
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                  # Eat the '^C'
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                  STDOUT.write("\b\b")
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                  STDOUT.flush
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
                end
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
          
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                Rpush.logger.info('Shutting down... ', true)
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
          
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
                shutdown_lock.synchronize do
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
                  Rpc::Server.stop
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
                  Feeder.stop
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                  AppRunner.stop
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                  delete_pid_file
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
                  puts ANSI.green { '' } if Rpush.config.foreground
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
                end
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
              end
        
      115.

              def self.shutdown_lock
        
      117. 
      
        
    117.

              def self.common_init

      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          1
          
              def self.init_store
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                return if store
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                begin
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
                  name = Rpush.config.client.to_s
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                  require "rpush/daemon/store/#{name}"
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
                  self.store = Rpush::Daemon::Store.const_get(name.camelcase).new
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
                rescue StandardError, LoadError => e
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
                  Rpush.logger.error("Failed to load '#{Rpush.config.client}' storage backend.")
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
                  Rpush.logger.error(e)
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                  exit 1
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                end
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
              end
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
          
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          1
          
              def self.init_plugins
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
                Rpush.plugins.each do |name, plugin|
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
                  plugin.init_block.call
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
                  Rpush.logger.info("[plugin:#{name}] Loaded.")
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
                end
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
              end
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
          
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          1
          
              def self.daemonize?
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
                !(Rpush.config.push || Rpush.config.foreground || Rpush.config.embedded || Rpush.jruby?)
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
              end
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
          
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          1
          
              def self.write_pid_file
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
                unless Rpush.config.pid_file.blank?
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
                  begin
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
                    FileUtils.mkdir_p(File.dirname(Rpush.config.pid_file))
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
                    File.open(Rpush.config.pid_file, 'w') { |f| f.puts Process.pid }
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
                  rescue SystemCallError => e
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
                    Rpush.logger.error("Failed to write PID to '#{Rpush.config.pid_file}': #{e.inspect}")
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
                  end
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
                end
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
              end
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
          
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          1
          
              def self.delete_pid_file
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
                pid_file = Rpush.config.pid_file
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
                File.delete(pid_file) if !pid_file.blank? && File.exist?(pid_file)
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
              end
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
          
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          1
          
              def self.show_welcome_if_needed
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
                if Rpush::Daemon::AppRunner.app_ids.count == 0
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
                  puts <<-EOS
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
          
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
          * #{ANSI.green { 'Is this your first time using Rpush?' }}
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
            You need to create an App before you can start using Rpush.
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
            Please refer to the documentation at https://github.com/rpush/rpush
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
          
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
                  EOS
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
                end
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
              end
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
            end
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
          end
        
      180.

                class Delivery < Rpush::Daemon::Delivery

                  # Oauth2.0 token endpoint. This endpoint is used to request authorization tokens.
        
      9.

          1
          
                  AMAZON_TOKEN_URI = URI.parse('https://api.amazon.com/auth/O2/token')

    11. 
          
          
                  # ADM services endpoint. This endpoint is used to perform ADM requests.
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          1
          
                  AMAZON_ADM_URL = 'https://api.amazon.com/messaging/registrations/%s/messages'
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
          
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
                  # Data used to request authorization tokens.
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          1
          
                  ACCESS_TOKEN_REQUEST_DATA = { "grant_type" => "client_credentials", "scope" => "messaging:push" }

                  def initialize(app, http, notification, batch)
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                    @app = app
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                    @http = http
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                    @notification = notification
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                    @batch = batch
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                    @sent_registration_ids = []
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
                    @failed_registration_ids = {}
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
                  end
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
          
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
                  def perform
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                    @notification.registration_ids.each do |registration_id|
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                      handle_response(do_post(registration_id), registration_id)
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                    end
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                    if @sent_registration_ids.empty?
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                      fail Rpush::DeliveryError.new(nil, @notification.id, describe_errors)
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                    else
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                      unless @failed_registration_ids.empty?
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                        @notification.error_description = describe_errors
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                        Rpush::Daemon.store.update_notification(@notification)
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                      end
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                      mark_delivered
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                    end
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                  rescue Rpush::RateLimitError => error
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                    handle_rate_limited(error)
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                  rescue Rpush::RetryableError => error
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                    handle_retryable(error)
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                  rescue SocketError => error
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                    mark_retryable(@notification, Time.now + 10.seconds, error)
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                    raise
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                  rescue StandardError => error
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                    mark_failed(error)
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                    raise
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                  ensure
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                    @batch.notification_processed
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                  end
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
          
        
      53.

          1
          
                  protected
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          1
          
                  def handle_response(response, current_registration_id)
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                    case response.code.to_i
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                    when 200
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                      ok(response, current_registration_id)
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                    when 400
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                      bad_request(response, current_registration_id)
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                    when 401
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                      unauthorized(response)
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                    when 429
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                      rate_limited(response)
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                    when 500
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                      internal_server_error(current_registration_id)
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                    when 503
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                      service_unavailable(response)
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                    else
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                      fail Rpush::DeliveryError.new(response.code, @notification.id, Rpush::Daemon::HTTP_STATUS_CODES[response.code.to_i])
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                    end
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                  end
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
          
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          1
          
                  def ok(response, current_registration_id)
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                    response_body = multi_json_load(response.body)
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
          
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                    if response_body.key?('registrationID')
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
                      @sent_registration_ids << response_body['registrationID']
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
                      log_info("#{@notification.id} sent to #{response_body['registrationID']}")
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
                    end
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
          
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
                    return if current_registration_id == response_body['registrationID']
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
          
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                    reflect(:adm_canonical_id, current_registration_id, response_body['registrationID'])
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                  end
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
          
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          1
          
                  def handle_retryable(error)
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                    case error.code
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
                    when 401
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                      # clear app access_token so a new one is fetched
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
                      @notification.app.access_token = nil
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
                      access_token
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
                      mark_retryable(@notification, Time.now) if @notification.app.access_token
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
                    when 503
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
                      retry_delivery(@notification, error.response)
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                      log_warn("ADM responded with an Service Unavailable Error. " + retry_message)
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
                    end
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                  end
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
          
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          1
          
                  def handle_rate_limited(error)
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                    if @sent_registration_ids.empty?
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                      # none sent yet, just resend after the specified retry-after response.header
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
                      retry_delivery(@notification, error.response)
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
                    else
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                      # save unsent registration ids
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                      unsent_registration_ids = @notification.registration_ids.select { |reg_id| !@sent_registration_ids.include?(reg_id) }
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
          
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
                      # update the current notification so it only contains the sent reg ids
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
                      @notification.registration_ids.reject! { |reg_id| !@sent_registration_ids.include?(reg_id) }
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
          
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                      Rpush::Daemon.store.update_notification(@notification)
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
          
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
                      # create a new notification with the remaining unsent reg ids
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
                      create_new_notification(error.response, unsent_registration_ids)
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
          
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                      # mark the current notification as sent
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                      mark_delivered
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
                    end
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
                  end
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
          
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          1
          
                  def bad_request(response, current_registration_id)
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                    response_body = multi_json_load(response.body)
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
          
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                    return unless response_body.key?('reason')
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
          
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                    reason = response_body['reason']
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                    log_warn("bad_request: #{current_registration_id} (#{reason})")
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                    @failed_registration_ids[current_registration_id] = reason
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
          
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
                    reflect(:adm_failed_to_recipient, @notification, current_registration_id, reason)
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                  end
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
          
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          1
          
                  def unauthorized(response)
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
                    # Indicate a notification is retryable. Because ADM requires separate request for each push token, this will safely mark the entire notification to retry delivery.
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
                    fail Rpush::RetryableError.new(response.code.to_i, @notification.id, 'ADM responded with an Unauthorized Error.', response)
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                  end
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
          
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          1
          
                  def rate_limited(response)
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
                    # raise error so the current notification stops sending messages to remaining reg ids
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
                    fail Rpush::RateLimitError.new(response.code.to_i, @notification.id, 'Exceeded maximum allowable rate of messages.', response)
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
                  end
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
          
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          1
          
                  def internal_server_error(current_registration_id)
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
                    @failed_registration_ids[current_registration_id] = "Internal Server Error"
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
                    log_warn("internal_server_error: #{current_registration_id} (Internal Server Error)")
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                  end
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
          
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          1
          
                  def service_unavailable(response)
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
                    # Indicate a notification is retryable. Because ADM requires separate request for each push token, this will safely mark the entire notification to retry delivery.
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
                    fail Rpush::RetryableError.new(response.code.to_i, @notification.id, 'ADM responded with an Service Unavailable Error.', response)
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
                  end
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
          
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          1
          
                  def create_new_notification(response, registration_ids)
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
                    attrs = { 'app_id' => @notification.app_id, 'collapse_key' => @notification.collapse_key, 'delay_while_idle' => @notification.delay_while_idle }
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
                    Rpush::Daemon.store.create_adm_notification(attrs, @notification.data, registration_ids, deliver_after_header(response), @notification.app)
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
                  end
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
          
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          1
          
                  def deliver_after_header(response)
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
                    Rpush::Daemon::RetryHeaderParser.parse(response.header['retry-after'])
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
                  end
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
          
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          1
          
                  def retry_delivery(notification, response)
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
                    time = deliver_after_header(response)
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
                    if time
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
                      mark_retryable(notification, time)
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
                    else
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
                      mark_retryable_exponential(notification)
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
                    end
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
                  end
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
          
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          1
          
                  def describe_errors
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
                    if @failed_registration_ids.size == @notification.registration_ids.size
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
                      "Failed to deliver to all recipients."
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
                    else
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
                      error_msgs = []
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
                      @failed_registration_ids.each_pair { |regId, reason| error_msgs.push("#{regId}: #{reason}") }
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
                      "Failed to deliver to recipients: \n#{error_msgs.join("\n")}"
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
                    end
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
                  end
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
          
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          1
          
                  def retry_message
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
                    "Notification #{@notification.id} will be retired after #{@notification.deliver_after.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')} (retry #{@notification.retries})."
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
                  end
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
          
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          1
          
                  def do_post(registration_id)
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
                    adm_uri = URI.parse(format(AMAZON_ADM_URL, registration_id))
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
                    post = Net::HTTP::Post.new(adm_uri.path,
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
                                               'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
                                               'Accept' => 'application/json',
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
                                               'x-amzn-type-version' => 'com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMMessage@1.0',
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
                                               'x-amzn-accept-type' => 'com.amazon.device.messaging.ADMSendResult@1.0',
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
                                               'Authorization' => "Bearer #{access_token}")
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
                    post.body = @notification.as_json.to_json
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
          
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
                    @http.request(adm_uri, post)
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
                  end
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
          
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          1
          
                  def access_token
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
                    if @notification.app.access_token.nil? || @notification.app.access_token_expired?
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
                      post = Net::HTTP::Post.new(AMAZON_TOKEN_URI.path, 'Content-Type' => 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded')
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
                      post.set_form_data(ACCESS_TOKEN_REQUEST_DATA.merge('client_id' => @notification.app.client_id, 'client_secret' => @notification.app.client_secret))
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
          
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
                      handle_access_token(@http.request(AMAZON_TOKEN_URI, post))
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
                    end
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
          
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
                    @notification.app.access_token
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
                  end
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
          
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          1
          
                  def handle_access_token(response)
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
                    if response.code.to_i == 200
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
                      update_access_token(JSON.parse(response.body))
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
                      Rpush::Daemon.store.update_app(@notification.app)
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
                      log_info("ADM access token updated: token = #{@notification.app.access_token}, expires = #{@notification.app.access_token_expiration}")
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
                    else
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
                      log_warn("Could not retrieve access token from ADM: #{response.body}")
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
                    end
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          
          
                  end
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
          
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          1
          
                  def update_access_token(data)
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
                    @notification.app.access_token = data['access_token']
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          
          
                    @notification.app.access_token_expiration = Time.now + data['expires_in'].to_i
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          
          
                  end
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          
          
                end
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          
          
              end
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          
          
            end
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          
          
          end
        
      227.

    lib/rpush/daemon/apns.rb

              module Apns

                extend ServiceConfigMethods
        
      5.

      6.

                HOSTS = {
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
                  production: ['gateway.push.apple.com', 2195],
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
                  development: ['gateway.sandbox.push.apple.com', 2195], # deprecated
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                  sandbox: ['gateway.sandbox.push.apple.com', 2195]
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
                }
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
          
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          1
          
                batch_deliveries true
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          1
          
                dispatcher :apns_tcp, host: proc { |app| HOSTS[app.environment.to_sym] }
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          1
          
                loops Rpush::Daemon::Apns::FeedbackReceiver, if: -> { Rpush.config.apns.feedback_receiver.enabled && !Rpush.config.push }
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
              end
