    lib/rpush/daemon/apns/delivery.rb

    34.62 % covered

    26 relevant lines. 9 lines covered and 17 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          1
          
          module Rpush
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          1
          
            module Daemon
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          1
          
              module Apns
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          1
          
                class Delivery < Rpush::Daemon::Delivery
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          1
          
                  def initialize(app, connection, batch)
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
                    @app = app
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
                    @connection = connection
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
                    @batch = batch
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                  end
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
          
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          1
          
                  def perform
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
                    @connection.write(batch_to_binary)
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
                    mark_batch_delivered
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
                    describe_deliveries
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                  rescue Rpush::Daemon::TcpConnectionError => error
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                    mark_batch_retryable(Time.now + 10.seconds, error)
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                    raise
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                  rescue StandardError => error
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                    mark_batch_failed(error)
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                    raise
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                  ensure
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                    @batch.all_processed
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
                  end
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
          
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
                  protected
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
          
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          1
          
                  def batch_to_binary
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                    payload = ""
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                    @batch.each_notification do |notification|
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                      payload << notification.to_binary
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                    end
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                    payload
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                  end
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          1
          
                  def describe_deliveries
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                    @batch.each_notification do |notification|
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                      log_info("#{notification.id} sent to #{notification.device_token}")
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                    end
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                  end
        
      40.

                end

                  TUPLE_BYTES = 38
        
      11.

          1
          
                  HOSTS = {

                    production: ['feedback.push.apple.com', 2196],

                  def initialize(app)
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                    @app = app
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                    @host, @port = HOSTS[@app.environment.to_sym]

    20.

    22.

    23. 
          
          
                  end

                  def start
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                    return if Rpush.config.push
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                    Rpush.logger.info("[#{@app.name}] Starting feedback receiver... ", true)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
          
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                    @thread = Thread.new do
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                      loop do
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                        break if @stop
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                        check_for_feedback
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                        @interruptible_sleep.sleep(Rpush.config.apns.feedback_receiver.frequency)
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                      end
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
          
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                      Rpush::Daemon.store.release_connection
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                    end
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
          
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                    puts ANSI.green { '' } if Rpush.config.foreground
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                  end
        
      41. 
      
        
    41.

                  def stop
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                    @stop = true
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                    @interruptible_sleep.stop
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                    @thread.join if @thread
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                  rescue StandardError => e
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                    log_error(e)
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                    reflect(:error, e)
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                  ensure
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                    @thread = nil
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                  end
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
          
        
      53.

          1
          
                  def check_for_feedback
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                    connection = nil
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                    begin
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                      connection = Rpush::Daemon::TcpConnection.new(@app, @host, @port)
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                      connection.connect
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                      tuple = connection.read(TUPLE_BYTES)
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
          
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                      while tuple
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                        timestamp, device_token = parse_tuple(tuple)
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                        create_feedback(timestamp, device_token)
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                        tuple = connection.read(TUPLE_BYTES)
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                      end
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                    rescue StandardError => e
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                      log_error(e)
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                      reflect(:error, e)
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                    ensure
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                      connection.close if connection
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                    end
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                  end
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
          
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          1
          
                  protected
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
          
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          1
          
                  def parse_tuple(tuple)
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
                    failed_at, _, device_token = tuple.unpack("N1n1H*")
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                    [Time.at(failed_at).utc, device_token]
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
                  end
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
          
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          1
          
                  def create_feedback(failed_at, device_token)
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                    formatted_failed_at = failed_at.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S UTC')
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
                    log_info("[FeedbackReceiver] Delivery failed at #{formatted_failed_at} for #{device_token}.")
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
          
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                    feedback = Rpush::Daemon.store.create_apns_feedback(failed_at, device_token, @app)
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                    reflect(:apns_feedback, feedback)
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                  end
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                end
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
              end
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
            end
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
          end

                HTTP2_HEADERS_KEY = 'headers'

          1
          
                class Delivery < Rpush::Daemon::Delivery
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          1
          
                  RETRYABLE_CODES = [ 429, 500, 503 ]
        
      10.

          1
          
                  def initialize(app, http2_client, batch)
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
                    @app = app
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
                    @client = http2_client
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
                    @batch = batch
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                  end
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
          
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          1
          
                  def perform
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                    @client.on(:error) { |err| mark_batch_retryable(Time.now + 10.seconds, err) }
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
          
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                    @batch.each_notification do |notification|
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                      prepare_async_post(notification)
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                    end
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
          
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
                    # Send all preprocessed requests at once
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                    @client.join
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                  rescue Errno::ECONNREFUSED, SocketError => error
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                    mark_batch_retryable(Time.now + 10.seconds, error)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                    raise
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                  rescue StandardError => error
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                    mark_batch_failed(error)

    31. 
          
          
                    raise
        
      32.

                  ensure
        
      33.

                  protected

                  ######################################################################

          1
          
                  def prepare_async_post(notification)
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                    response = {}
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
          
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                    request = build_request(notification)
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                    http_request = @client.prepare_request(:post, request[:path],
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                      body:    request[:body],
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                      headers: request[:headers]
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                    )
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
          
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                    http_request.on(:headers) do |hdrs|
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                      response[:code] = hdrs[':status'].to_i
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                    end
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
          
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                    http_request.on(:body_chunk) do |body_chunk|
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                      next unless body_chunk.present?
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                      response[:failure_reason] = JSON.parse(body_chunk)['reason']
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                    end
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
          
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                    http_request.on(:close) { handle_response(notification, response) }
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
          
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                    @client.call_async(http_request)
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                  end
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
          
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          1
          
                  def handle_response(notification, response)
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                    code = response[:code]
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                    case code
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                    when 200
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                      ok(notification)
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                    when *RETRYABLE_CODES
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                      service_unavailable(notification, response)
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                    else
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                      reflect(:notification_id_failed,
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                        @app,
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
                        notification.id, code,
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
                        response[:failure_reason])
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                      @batch.mark_failed(notification, response[:code], response[:failure_reason])
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
                      failed_message_to_log(notification, response)
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                    end
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
                  end
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
          
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          1
          
                  def ok(notification)
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                    log_info("#{notification.id} sent to #{notification.device_token}")
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
                    @batch.mark_delivered(notification)
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
                  end
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
          
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          1
          
                  def service_unavailable(notification, response)
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                    @batch.mark_retryable(notification, Time.now + 10.seconds)
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                    # Logs should go last as soon as we need to initialize
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                    # retry time to display it in log
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
                    failed_message_to_log(notification, response)
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                    retry_message_to_log(notification)
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
                  end
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
          
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          1
          
                  def build_request(notification)
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
                    {
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
                      path:    "/3/device/#{notification.device_token}",
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                      headers: prepare_headers(notification),
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
                      body:    prepare_body(notification)
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                    }
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
                  end
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
          
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          1
          
                  def prepare_body(notification)
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                    hash = notification.as_json.except(HTTP2_HEADERS_KEY)
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
                    JSON.dump(hash).force_encoding(Encoding::BINARY)
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
                  end
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
          
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          1
          
                  def prepare_headers(notification)
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
                    notification_data(notification)[HTTP2_HEADERS_KEY] || {}
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
                  end
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
          
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          1
          
                  def notification_data(notification)
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                    notification.data || {}
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
                  end
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
          
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          1
          
                  def retry_message_to_log(notification)
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
                    log_warn("Notification #{notification.id} will be retried after "\
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                      "#{notification.deliver_after.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')} "\
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                      "(retry #{notification.retries}).")
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
                  end
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
          
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          1
          
                  def failed_message_to_log(notification, response)
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
                    log_error("Notification #{notification.id} failed, "\
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                      "#{response[:code]}/#{response[:failure_reason]}")
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                  end
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                end
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
              end
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
            end
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
          end

                  def initialize(app, http2_client, token_provider, batch)
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
                    @app = app
        
      13. 
      
        
    13.

      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
                    @batch = batch

    15.

                  def perform
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                    @client.on(:error) { |err| mark_batch_retryable(Time.now + 10.seconds, err) }
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
          
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                    @batch.each_notification do |notification|
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
                      prepare_async_post(notification)
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
                    end
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
          
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                    # Send all preprocessed requests at once
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                    @client.join
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                  rescue Errno::ECONNREFUSED, SocketError, HTTP2::Error::StreamLimitExceeded => error
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                    # TODO restart connection when StreamLimitExceeded
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                    mark_batch_retryable(Time.now + 10.seconds, error)
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                    raise
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                  rescue StandardError => error
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                    mark_batch_failed(error)
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                    raise
        
      35.

                  def prepare_async_post(notification)
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                    response = {}
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
          
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                    request = build_request(notification)
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                    log_warn(request)
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                    http_request = @client.prepare_request(:post, request[:path],
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                      body:    request[:body],
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                      headers: request[:headers]
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                    )
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
          
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                    http_request.on(:headers) do |hdrs|
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                      response[:code] = hdrs[':status'].to_i
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                    end
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
          
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                    http_request.on(:body_chunk) do |body_chunk|
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                      next unless body_chunk.present?
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
          
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                      response[:failure_reason] = JSON.parse(body_chunk)['reason']
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                    end
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
          
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                    http_request.on(:close) { handle_response(notification, response) }
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
          
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                    if @first_push
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                      @first_push = false
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                      @client.call_async(http_request)
        
      67.

                  def delayed_push_async(http_request)
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
                    until streams_available? do
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
                      sleep 0.001
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                    end
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
                    @client.call_async(http_request)
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                  end
        
      78.

      79.

                  def streams_available?
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
                    remote_max_concurrent_streams - @client.stream_count > 0
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                  end
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
          
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          1
          
                  def remote_max_concurrent_streams
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                    # 0x7fffffff is the default value from http-2 gem (2^31)
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                    if @client.remote_settings[:settings_max_concurrent_streams] == 0x7fffffff
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                      0
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                    else
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                      @client.remote_settings[:settings_max_concurrent_streams]

                  def handle_response(notification, response)
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
                    code = response[:code]
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
                    case code
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
                    when 200
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                      ok(notification)
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
                    when *RETRYABLE_CODES
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                      service_unavailable(notification, response)
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
                    else
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                      reflect(:notification_id_failed,
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                        @app,
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                        notification.id, code,
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
                        response[:failure_reason])
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
                      @batch.mark_failed(notification, response[:code], response[:failure_reason])
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                      failed_message_to_log(notification, response)
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                    end
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
                  end
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
          
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          1
          
                  def ok(notification)
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                    log_info("#{notification.id} sent to #{notification.device_token}")
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                    @batch.mark_delivered(notification)
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
                  end
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
          
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          1
          
                  def service_unavailable(notification, response)
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
                    @batch.mark_retryable(notification, Time.now + 10.seconds)
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                    # Logs should go last as soon as we need to initialize
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                    # retry time to display it in log
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
                    failed_message_to_log(notification, response)
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
                    retry_message_to_log(notification)
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
                  end
        
      121.

      122.

                  def build_request(notification)
        
      123.

                    {
        
      124.

                  def prepare_body(notification)
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                    hash = notification.as_json.except(HTTP2_HEADERS_KEY)
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
                    JSON.dump(hash).force_encoding(Encoding::BINARY)
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
                  end
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
          
        
      135.

          1
          
                  def prepare_headers(notification)
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                    jwt_token = @token_provider.token
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
          
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
                    headers = {}
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
                    
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
                    headers['content-type'] = 'application/json'
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
                    headers['apns-expiration'] = '0'
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
                    headers['apns-priority'] = '10'
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
                    headers['apns-topic'] = @app.bundle_id
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
                    headers['authorization'] = "bearer #{jwt_token}"
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
          
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                    headers.merge notification_data(notification)[HTTP2_HEADERS_KEY] || {}
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
                  end
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
          
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          1

      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
                    notification.data || {}
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
                  end
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
          
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          1
          
                  def retry_message_to_log(notification)
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
                    log_warn("Notification #{notification.id} will be retried after "\
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
                      "#{notification.deliver_after.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')} "\
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
                      "(retry #{notification.retries}).")
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
                  end
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
          
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          1
          
                  def failed_message_to_log(notification, response)
        
      160.

                    log_error("Notification #{notification.id} failed, "\
        
      161.

      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
                  end
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
                end

                  def new_token

                    ec_key = OpenSSL::PKey::EC.new(@app.apn_key)

      24.

      25.

                        iss: @app.team_id,
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                        iat: Time.now.to_i

    27.

      28.

                      ec_key,
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                      'ES256',
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                      {
        
      31. 
      
        
    31.

      32.

    33.

                def self.enqueue(notifications)
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                  notifications.group_by(&:app_id).each do |app_id, group|
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                    start_app_with_id(app_id) unless @runners[app_id]
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                    @runners[app_id].enqueue(group) if @runners[app_id]
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                  end

                def self.start_app_with_id(app_id)
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                  start_app(Rpush::Daemon.store.app(app_id))
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                end
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
          
        
      28.

          1
          
                def self.start_app(app)
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                  Rpush.logger.info("[#{app.name}] Starting #{pluralize(app.connections, 'dispatcher')}... ", true)
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                  runner = @runners[app.id] = new(app)
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                  runner.start_dispatchers
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                  puts ANSI.green { '' } if Rpush.config.foreground
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                  runner.start_loops
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                rescue StandardError => e
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                  @runners.delete(app.id)
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                  Rpush.logger.error("[#{app.name}] Exception raised during startup. Notifications will not be delivered for this app.")
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                  Rpush.logger.error(e)
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                  reflect(:error, e)
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                end
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
          
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          1
          
                def self.stop_app(app_id)
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                  runner = @runners.delete(app_id)
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                  if runner
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                    runner.stop
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                    log_info("[#{runner.app.name}] Stopped.")
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                  end
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                end
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
          
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          1
          
                def self.app_with_id(app_id)

                  @runners[app_id].app
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                end
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
          
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          1
          
                def self.app_running?(app)

                  @runners.key?(app.id)

    55. 
          
          
                end

                def self.app_ids

                def self.stop
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                  @runners.values.map(&:stop)

    63. 
          
          
                  @runners.clear
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                end
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
          
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          1
          
                def self.total_dispatchers
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                  @runners.values.sum(&:num_dispatcher_loops)
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                end
        
      69.

      70.

          1

      71.

                  @runners.values.sum(&:queue_size)
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                end
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
          
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          1
          
                def self.num_dispatchers_for_app(app)
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                  runner = @runners[app.id]
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
                  runner ? runner.num_dispatcher_loops : 0
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                end
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
          
        
      79.

                def self.status

                def initialize(app)
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
                  @app = app
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                  @loops = []
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
                  @dispatcher_loops = []
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                end
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
          
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          1
          
                def start_dispatchers
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                  app.connections.times { @dispatcher_loops.push(new_dispatcher_loop) }
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                end
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
          
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          1
          
                def start_loops
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                  @loops = service.loop_instances(@app)
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                  @loops.map(&:start)
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
                end
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
          
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          1
          
                def stop
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                  wait_until_idle
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                  stop_dispatcher_loops
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
                  stop_loops
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
                end
        
      114.

      115.

          1
          
                def wait_until_idle
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                  sleep 0.5 while queue.size > 0
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                end
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
          
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          1
          
                def enqueue(notifications)
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
                  if service.batch_deliveries?
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
                    batch_size = (notifications.size / num_dispatcher_loops.to_f).ceil
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                    notifications.in_groups_of(batch_size, false).each do |batch_notifications|
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                      batch = Batch.new(batch_notifications)
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                      queue.push(QueuePayload.new(batch))
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                    end
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                  else
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                    batch = Batch.new(notifications)
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                    notifications.each do |notification|
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                      queue.push(QueuePayload.new(batch, notification))
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
                      reflect(:notification_enqueued, notification)
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                    end
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
                  end
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
                end
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
          
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          1
          
                def decrement_dispatchers(num)
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                  num.times { @dispatcher_loops.pop.stop }
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                end
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
          
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          1
          
                def increment_dispatchers(num)
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
                  num.times { @dispatcher_loops.push(new_dispatcher_loop) }
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
                end
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
          
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          1
          
                def status
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
                  dispatcher_details = {}
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
          
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                  @dispatcher_loops.each_with_index do |dispatcher_loop, i|
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
                    dispatcher_details[i] = {
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
                      started_at: dispatcher_loop.started_at.iso8601,
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
                      dispatched: dispatcher_loop.dispatch_count,
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
                      thread_status: dispatcher_loop.thread_status
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
                    }
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
                  end
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
          
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
                  { app_name: @app.name, dispatchers: dispatcher_details, queued: queue_size }
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
                end
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
          
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          1

                def stop_loops

      165.

                  @loops = []
        
      166.

                end
        
      167.

      168.

                def stop_dispatcher_loops
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
                  @dispatcher_loops.map(&:stop)
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
                  @dispatcher_loops.clear
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
                end
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
          
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          1
          
                def new_dispatcher_loop
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
                  dispatcher = service.new_dispatcher(@app)
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
                  dispatcher_loop = Rpush::Daemon::DispatcherLoop.new(queue, dispatcher)
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
                  dispatcher_loop.start
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
                  dispatcher_loop
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
                end
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
          
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          1
          
                def service
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
                  return @service if defined? @service
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
                  @service = "Rpush::Daemon::#{@app.service_name.camelize}".constantize
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
                end
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
          
        
      185.

                def queue
        
      186.

                  @queue ||= Queue.new

                end
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
              end
        
      189. 
      
        
    189.

                def mark_retryable(notification, deliver_after)
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                  @mutex.synchronize do
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                    @retryable[deliver_after] ||= []
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                    @retryable[deliver_after] << notification
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                  end
        
      34.

                  Rpush::Daemon.store.mark_retryable(notification, deliver_after, persist: false)
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                end
        
      36.

                def mark_failed(notification, code, description)
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                  key = [code, description]
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                  @mutex.synchronize do
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                    @failed[key] ||= []

                    @failed[key] << notification

                  Rpush::Daemon.store.mark_failed(notification, code, description, Time.now, persist: false)

                end

                def mark_all_failed(code, message)

                  key = [code, message]
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
                  @mutex.synchronize do

                    @failed[key] = @notifications

                def notification_processed

                def complete
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                  return if complete?
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
          
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                  [:complete_delivered, :complete_failed, :complete_retried].each do |method|
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                    begin
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                      send(method)
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
                    rescue StandardError => e
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
                      Rpush.logger.error(e)
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                      reflect(:error, e)
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                    end
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
                  end
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
          
        
      109.

    110.

      112.

          1
          
                def complete_delivered

      116.

                end
        
      118.

      119.

                  @failed.each do |(code, description), notifications|

      123.

                      reflect(:notification_failed, notification)
        
      124.

    126. 
          
          
                end
        
      127.

      128.

                def complete_retried

    129.

              HTTP_STATUS_CODES = {

                def mark_retryable(notification, deliver_after, error = nil)
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
                  if notification.fail_after && notification.fail_after < Time.now
        
      9. 
      
        
    9.

    10.

    13.

                  def prepare_ssl_context
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                    @ssl_context ||= begin
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                      ctx = OpenSSL::SSL::SSLContext.new
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                      begin
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                        p12      = OpenSSL::PKCS12.new(@app.certificate, @app.password)
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                        ctx.key  = p12.key
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                        ctx.cert = p12.certificate
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                      rescue OpenSSL::PKCS12::PKCS12Error
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                        ctx.key  = OpenSSL::PKey::RSA.new(@app.certificate, @app.password)
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                        ctx.cert = OpenSSL::X509::Certificate.new(@app.certificate)
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                      end
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                      ctx

                  def dispatch(payload)

                  def cleanup
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                    if Rpush.config.push
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                      # In push mode only a single batch is sent, followed by immediate shutdown.
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                      # Allow the error receiver time to handle any errors.
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                      @reconnect_disabled = true
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                      sleep 1
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                    end
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
          
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                    @stop_error_receiver = true
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                    super
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                    @error_receiver_thread.join if @error_receiver_thread
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                  rescue StandardError => e
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                    log_error(e)
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                    reflect(:error, e)
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                  ensure
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                    @error_receiver_thread = nil
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                  end
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55.

          1
          
                  private
        
      56.

      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          1
          
                  def start_error_receiver
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                    @error_receiver_thread = Thread.new do
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                      check_for_error until @stop_error_receiver
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                      Rpush::Daemon.store.release_connection
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                    end
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                  end
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
          
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          1
          
                  def delivered_buffer
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                    @delivered_buffer ||= RingBuffer.new(Rpush.config.batch_size * 10)
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                  end
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
          
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          1
          
                  def record_batch(batch)
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                    batch.each_delivered do |notification|
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                      delivered_buffer << notification.id
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                    end
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                  end
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
          
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          1
          
                  def check_for_error
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                    begin
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
                      # On Linux, select returns nil from a dropped connection.
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                      # On OS X, Errno::EBADF is raised following a Errno::EADDRNOTAVAIL from the write call.
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
                      return unless @connection.select(SELECT_TIMEOUT)
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
                      tuple = @connection.read(ERROR_TUPLE_BYTES)
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
                    rescue *TcpConnection::TCP_ERRORS
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                      reconnect unless @stop_error_receiver
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
                      return
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
                    end
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
          
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                    @dispatch_mutex.synchronize { handle_error_response(tuple) }
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                  rescue StandardError => e
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                    log_error(e)
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                  end
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
          
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          1
          
                  def handle_error_response(tuple)
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
                    if tuple
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
                      _, code, notification_id = tuple.unpack('ccN')
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
                      handle_error(code, notification_id)
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
                    else
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
                      handle_disconnect
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                    end
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
          
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                    if Rpush.config.push
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
                      # Only attempt to handle a single error in Push mode.
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                      @stop_error_receiver = true
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                      return
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                    end
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
          
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
                    reconnect
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                  ensure
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                    delivered_buffer.clear
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
                  end
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
          
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          1
          
                  def reconnect
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                    return if @reconnect_disabled
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                    log_error("Lost connection to #{@connection.host}:#{@connection.port}, reconnecting...")
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
                    @connection.reconnect_with_rescue
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
                  end
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
          
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          1
          
                  def handle_disconnect
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                    log_error("The APNs disconnected before any notifications could be delivered. This usually indicates you are using an invalid certificate.") if delivered_buffer.size == 0
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                  end
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
          
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          1
          
                  def handle_error(code, notification_id)
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
                    notification_id = Rpush::Daemon.store.translate_integer_notification_id(notification_id)
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
                    failed_pos = delivered_buffer.index(notification_id)
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                    description = description_for_code(code)
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                    log_error("Notification #{notification_id} failed with error: " + description)
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                    Rpush::Daemon.store.mark_ids_failed([notification_id], code, description, Time.now)
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                    reflect(:notification_id_failed, @app, notification_id, code, description)
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
          
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                    if failed_pos
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                      retry_ids = delivered_buffer[(failed_pos + 1)..-1]
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                      retry_notification_ids(retry_ids, notification_id)
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
                    elsif delivered_buffer.size > 0
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                      log_error("Delivery sequence unknown for notifications following #{notification_id}.")
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
                    end
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
                  end
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
          
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          1
          
                  def description_for_code(code)
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                    APNS_ERRORS[code.to_i] ? "#{APNS_ERRORS[code.to_i]} (#{code})" : "Unknown error code #{code.inspect}. Possible Rpush bug?"
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                  end
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
          
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          1
          
                  def retry_notification_ids(ids, notification_id)
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
                    return if ids.size == 0
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
          
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
                    now = Time.now
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
                    Rpush::Daemon.store.mark_ids_retryable(ids, now)
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
                    notifications_str = 'Notification'
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
                    notifications_str += 's' if ids.size > 1
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                    log_warn("#{notifications_str} #{ids.join(', ')} will be retried due to the failure of notification #{notification_id}.")
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
                    ids.each { |id| reflect(:notification_id_will_retry, @app, id, now) }
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
                  end
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
                end
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
              end
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
            end
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
          end
        
      153.

                def thread_status

                  @thread ? @thread.status : 'not started'

    19.

      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
          
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          1
          
                def start
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                  @started_at = Time.now
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
          
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
                  @thread = Thread.new do
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                    loop do
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                      payload = @queue.pop
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                      if stop_payload?(payload)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                        break if should_stop?(payload)
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                        # Intended for another dispatcher loop.
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                        @queue.push(payload)
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                        Thread.pass
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                        sleep 0.1
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                      else
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                        dispatch(payload)
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                      end
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                    end
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
          
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                    Rpush::Daemon.store.release_connection
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                  end
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                end
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
          
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          1
          
                def stop
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                  @queue.push([STOP, object_id]) if @thread
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                  @thread.join if @thread
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                  @dispatcher.cleanup
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                rescue StandardError => e
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                  log_error(e)
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                  reflect(:error, e)
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                ensure
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                  @thread = nil
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                end
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
          
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          1
          
                private
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
          
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          1
          
                def stop_payload?(payload)
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                  payload.is_a?(Array) && payload.first == STOP
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                end
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
          
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          1
          
                def should_stop?(payload)
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                  payload.last == object_id
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                end
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
          
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          1
          
                def dispatch(payload)
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                  @dispatch_count += 1
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                  @dispatcher.dispatch(payload)
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                rescue StandardError => e
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                  log_error(e)
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                  reflect(:error, e)
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                end
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
              end
        
      72.

                class << self
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          1
          
                  attr_accessor :should_stop
        
      40.
