                end
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
          
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          1
          
                def self.feed_all
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                  enqueue_notifications until Rpush::Daemon.store.pending_delivery_count == 0
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                end
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
          
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          1
          
                def self.feed_forever
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                  loop do
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                    enqueue_notifications
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                    interruptible_sleeper.sleep(Rpush.config.push_poll)
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                    return if should_stop
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                  end
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                end
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
          
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          1
          
                def self.enqueue_notifications
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                  batch_size = Rpush.config.batch_size - Rpush::Daemon::AppRunner.total_queued
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                  return if batch_size <= 0
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                  notifications = Rpush::Daemon.store.deliverable_notifications(batch_size)
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                  Rpush::Daemon::AppRunner.enqueue(notifications)
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                rescue StandardError => e
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                  Rpush.logger.error(e)
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                  reflect(:error, e)
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                end
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
          
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          1
          
                def self.interruptible_sleeper
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                  @interruptible_sleeper ||= InterruptibleSleep.new
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                end
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
              end
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
            end
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
          end
        
      70.

    lib/rpush/daemon/gcm/delivery.rb

    30.94 % covered

    139 relevant lines. 43 lines covered and 96 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          1
          
          module Rpush
        
      2.

          1
          
            module Daemon
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          1
          
              module Gcm
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
                # https://firebase.google.com/docs/cloud-messaging/server
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          1
          
                class Delivery < Rpush::Daemon::Delivery
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          1
          
                  include MultiJsonHelper
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
          
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          1
          
                  host = 'https://fcm.googleapis.com'
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          1
          
                  FCM_URI = URI.parse("#{host}/fcm/send")
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1
          
                  UNAVAILABLE_STATES = %w(Unavailable BadGateway InternalServerError)
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          1
          
                  INVALID_REGISTRATION_ID_STATES = %w(InvalidRegistration MismatchSenderId NotRegistered InvalidPackageName)
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
          
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          1
          
                  def initialize(app, http, notification, batch)
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
                    @app = app
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                    @http = http
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                    @notification = notification
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                    @batch = batch
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                  end
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
          
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          1
          
                  def perform
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                    handle_response(do_post)
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                  rescue SocketError => error
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
                    mark_retryable(@notification, Time.now + 10.seconds, error)
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
                    raise
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                  rescue StandardError => error
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                    mark_failed(error)
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                    raise
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                  ensure
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                    @batch.notification_processed
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                  end
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
          
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1
          
                  protected
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
          
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          1
          
                  def handle_response(response)
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                    case response.code.to_i
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                    when 200
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                      ok(response)
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                    when 400
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                      bad_request
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                    when 401
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                      unauthorized
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                    when 500
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                      internal_server_error(response)
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                    when 502
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                      bad_gateway(response)
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                    when 503
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                      service_unavailable(response)
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                    when 500..599
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                      other_5xx_error(response)
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                    else
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                      fail Rpush::DeliveryError.new(response.code.to_i, @notification.id, Rpush::Daemon::HTTP_STATUS_CODES[response.code.to_i])
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                    end
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                  end
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          1
          
                  def ok(response)
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                    results = process_response(response)
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                    handle_successes(results.successes)
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
          
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                    if results.failures.any?
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                      handle_failures(results.failures, response)
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                    else
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                      mark_delivered
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                      log_info("#{@notification.id} sent to #{@notification.registration_ids.join(', ')}")
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                    end
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                  end
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
          
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          1
          
                  def process_response(response)
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                    body = multi_json_load(response.body)
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                    results = Results.new(body['results'], @notification.registration_ids)
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                    results.process(invalid: INVALID_REGISTRATION_ID_STATES, unavailable: UNAVAILABLE_STATES)
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                    results
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                  end
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
          
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          1
          
                  def handle_successes(successes)
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                    successes.each do |result|
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
                      reflect(:gcm_delivered_to_recipient, @notification, result[:registration_id])
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                      next unless result.key?(:canonical_id)
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
                      reflect(:gcm_canonical_id, result[:registration_id], result[:canonical_id])
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
                    end
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
                  end
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
          
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          1
          
                  def handle_failures(failures, response)
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
                    if failures[:unavailable].count == @notification.registration_ids.count
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                      retry_delivery(@notification, response)
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                      log_warn("All recipients unavailable. #{retry_message}")
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                    else
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                      if failures[:unavailable].any?
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                        unavailable_idxs = failures[:unavailable].map { |result| result[:index] }
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
                        new_notification = create_new_notification(response, unavailable_idxs)
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                        failures.description += " #{unavailable_idxs.join(', ')} will be retried as notification #{new_notification.id}."
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
                      end
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
                      handle_errors(failures)
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
                      fail Rpush::DeliveryError.new(nil, @notification.id, failures.description)
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
                    end
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
                  end
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
          
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          1
          
                  def handle_errors(failures)
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                    failures.each do |result|
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
                      reflect(:gcm_failed_to_recipient, @notification, result[:error], result[:registration_id])
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                    end
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                    failures[:invalid].each do |result|
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                      reflect(:gcm_invalid_registration_id, @app, result[:error], result[:registration_id])
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
                    end
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
                  end
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
          
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          1
          
                  def create_new_notification(response, unavailable_idxs)
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
                    attrs = { 'app_id' => @notification.app_id, 'collapse_key' => @notification.collapse_key, 'delay_while_idle' => @notification.delay_while_idle }
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
                    registration_ids = @notification.registration_ids.values_at(*unavailable_idxs)
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
                    Rpush::Daemon.store.create_gcm_notification(attrs, @notification.data,
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                                                                registration_ids, deliver_after_header(response), @app)
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                  end
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
          
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          1
          
                  def bad_request
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
                    fail Rpush::DeliveryError.new(400, @notification.id, 'GCM failed to parse the JSON request. Possibly an Rpush bug, please open an issue.')
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
                  end
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
          
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          1
          
                  def unauthorized
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
                    fail Rpush::DeliveryError.new(401, @notification.id, 'Unauthorized, check your App auth_key.')
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
                  end
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
          
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          1
          
                  def internal_server_error(response)
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                    retry_delivery(@notification, response)
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                    log_warn("GCM responded with an Internal Error. " + retry_message)
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                  end
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
          
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          1
          
                  def bad_gateway(response)
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                    retry_delivery(@notification, response)
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                    log_warn("GCM responded with a Bad Gateway Error. " + retry_message)
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                  end
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
          
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          1
          
                  def service_unavailable(response)
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
                    retry_delivery(@notification, response)
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
                    log_warn("GCM responded with an Service Unavailable Error. " + retry_message)
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
                  end
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
          
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          1
          
                  def other_5xx_error(response)
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                    retry_delivery(@notification, response)
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
                    log_warn("GCM responded with a 5xx Error. " + retry_message)
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
                  end
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
          
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          1
          
                  def deliver_after_header(response)
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
                    Rpush::Daemon::RetryHeaderParser.parse(response.header['retry-after'])
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
                  end
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
          
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          1
          
                  def retry_delivery(notification, response)
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                    time = deliver_after_header(response)
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
                    if time
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
                      mark_retryable(notification, time)
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
                    else
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
                      mark_retryable_exponential(notification)
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
                    end
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
                  end
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
          
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          1
          
                  def retry_message
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
                    "Notification #{@notification.id} will be retried after #{@notification.deliver_after.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')} (retry #{@notification.retries})."
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
                  end
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
          
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          1
          
                  def do_post
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
                    post = Net::HTTP::Post.new(FCM_URI.path, 'Content-Type'  => 'application/json',
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
                                                             'Authorization' => "key=#{@app.auth_key}")
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
                    post.body = @notification.as_json.to_json
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
                    @http.request(FCM_URI, post)
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
                  end
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
                end
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
          
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          1
          
                class Results
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          1
          
                  attr_reader :successes, :failures
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
          
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          1
          
                  def initialize(results_data, registration_ids)
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
                    @results_data = results_data
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
                    @registration_ids = registration_ids
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
                  end
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
          
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          1
          
                  def process(failure_partitions = {}) # rubocop:disable Metrics/AbcSize
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
                    @successes = []
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
                    @failures = Failures.new
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
                    failure_partitions.each_key do |category|
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
                      failures[category] = []
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
                    end
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
          
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
                    @results_data.each_with_index do |result, index|
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
                      entry = {
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
                        registration_id: @registration_ids[index],
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
                        index: index
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
                      }
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
                      if result['message_id']
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
                        entry[:canonical_id] = result['registration_id'] if result['registration_id'].present?
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
                        successes << entry
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
                      elsif result['error']
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
                        entry[:error] = result['error']
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
                        failures << entry
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
                        failure_partitions.each do |category, error_states|
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
                          failures[category] << entry if error_states.include?(result['error'])
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
                        end
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
                      end
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
                    end
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
                    failures.all_failed = failures.count == @registration_ids.count
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
                  end
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
                end
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
          
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          1
          
                class Failures < Hash
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          1
          
                  include Enumerable
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          1
          
                  attr_writer :all_failed, :description
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
          
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          1
          
                  def initialize
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
                    super[:all] = []
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
                  end
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
          
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          1
          
                  def each
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
                    self[:all].each { |x| yield x }
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
                  end
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
          
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          1
          
                  def <<(item)
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
                    self[:all] << item
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
                  end
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
          
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          1
          
                  def description
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
                    @description ||= describe
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          
          
                  end
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
          
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          1
          
                  def any?
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          
          
                    self[:all].any?
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          
          
                  end
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          
          
          
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          1
          
                  private
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          
          
          
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          1
          
                  def describe
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          
          
                    if @all_failed
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          
          
                      error_description = "Failed to deliver to all recipients."
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          
          
                    else
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          
          
                      index_list = map { |item| item[:index] }
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          
          
                      error_description = "Failed to deliver to recipients #{index_list.join(', ')}."
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          
          
                    end
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          
          
          
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          
          
                    error_list = map { |item| item[:error] }
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          
          
                    error_description + " Errors: #{error_list.join(', ')}."
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          
          
                  end
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          
          
                end
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          
          
              end
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          
          
            end
        
      241. 
      
        
    241.

                def sleep(duration)
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
                  @thread = Thread.new { Kernel.sleep duration }

      9. 
      
        
    9.

    10.

                def stop

                  def perform
        
      17. 
      
        
    17.

                    process_response(response)
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                  rescue SocketError => error
        
      20.

                  def send_request

      34. 
      
        
    34.

                  def process_response(response)
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                    case response.code.to_i
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                    when 200
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                      process_delivery(response)
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                    when 429, 500, 502, 503, 504
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                      retry_delivery(response)
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                    else
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                      fail_delivery(response)
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                    end
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                  end
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
          
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          1
          
                  def process_delivery(response)
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                    mark_delivered
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                    body = multi_json_load(response.body)
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                    external_device_id = body['id']
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                    notification.external_device_id = external_device_id

    54. 
          
          
                    Rpush::Daemon.store.update_notification(notification)
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                    log_info("#{notification.id} received an external id=#{external_device_id}")
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                  end
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
          
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          1
          
                  def retry_delivery(response)
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                    time = deliver_after_header(response)
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                    if time
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                      mark_retryable(notification, time)
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                    else
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                      mark_retryable_exponential(notification)
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                    end
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                    log_warn("Pushy responded with a #{response.code} error. #{retry_message}")
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                  end
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
          
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          1
          
                  def deliver_after_header(response)

    70. 
          
          
                  end
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
          
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          1
          
                  def retry_message
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
                    deliver_after = notification.deliver_after.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
                    "Notification #{notification.id} will be retried after #{deliver_after} (retry #{notification.retries})."
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                  end
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
          
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          1
          
                  def fail_delivery(response)
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
                    fail_message = fail_message(response)
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
                    log_error("#{notification.id} failed: #{fail_message}")

    80.

      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                  end
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
          
        
      83.

          1
          
                  def fail_message(response)

                    body = multi_json_load(response.body)

    86. 
          
          
                  end
        
      87. 
      
        
    87.

      88.

                  def read_loop(socket)

      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55. 
      
        
    55.

      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                        cmd, args = JSON.load(line)

    57. 
          
          
                        log_debug("[rpc:server] #{cmd.to_sym.inspect}, args: #{args.inspect}")
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                        response = process(cmd, args)

    59.

                def self.start_handler(read_io)
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                  @thread = Thread.new do
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                    while readable_io = IO.select([read_io]) # rubocop:disable AssignmentInCondition
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                      signal = readable_io.first[0].gets.strip
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                      begin
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                        case signal
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                        when 'HUP'
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                          handle_hup
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                        when 'USR2'
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                          handle_usr2
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                        when 'INT', 'TERM'
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                          Thread.new { Rpush::Daemon.shutdown }
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                          break
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                        when 'break'
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                          break
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                        else
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                          Rpush.logger.error("Unhandled signal: #{signal}")
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                        end
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                      rescue StandardError => e
        
      50.

                  def deliverable_notifications(limit)

      32.

                        ids = relation.lock(true).ids

    35. 
          
          
                        unless ids.empty?

                  def mark_retryable(notification, deliver_after, opts = {})
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                    opts = DEFAULT_MARK_OPTIONS.dup.merge(opts)
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                    notification.processing = false
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                    notification.retries += 1
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                    notification.deliver_after = deliver_after
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                    return unless opts[:persist]
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
          
        
      57.

                    with_database_reconnect_and_retry do
        
      58.

                      notification.save!(validate: false)
        
      59.

                  def ready_for_delivery
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
                    relation = Rpush::Client::ActiveRecord::Notification.where('processing = ? AND delivered = ? AND failed = ? AND (deliver_after IS NULL OR deliver_after < ?)', false, false, false, Time.now)
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
                    relation.order('deliver_after ASC, created_at ASC')
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
                  end
        
      202.

                  def adapter_name

    204.

      205.

      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
                    return '' unless config
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
                    Hash[config.map { |k, v| [k.to_sym, v] }][:adapter]
        
      208.

                    def database_connection_lost
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          skipped
                      Rpush.logger.warn("Lost connection to database, reconnecting...")
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          skipped
                      attempts = 0
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          skipped
                      loop do
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          skipped
                        begin
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          skipped
                          Rpush.logger.warn("Attempt #{attempts += 1}")
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          skipped
                          reconnect_database
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          skipped
                          check_database_is_connected
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          skipped
                          break

          skipped

      56.

      57.

          skipped

      59.

          skipped
                      end
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          skipped
                      Rpush.logger.warn("Database reconnected")
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          skipped
                    end
        
      62.

          skipped

                  def self.check(klass)
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          2
          
                    missing = PUBLIC_METHODS - klass.instance_methods.map(&:to_sym)
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          2
          
                    fail "#{klass} must implement #{missing.join(', ')}." if missing.any?
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                  end

                  def deliverable_notifications(limit)
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                    retryable_ids = retryable_notification_ids
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                    limit -= retryable_ids.size
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                    pending_ids = limit > 0 ? pending_notification_ids(limit) : []
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                    ids = retryable_ids + pending_ids
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                    ids.map { |id| Rpush::Client::Redis::Notification.find(id) }
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                  end
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
          
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          1
          
                  def mark_delivered(notification, time, opts = {})
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
                    opts = DEFAULT_MARK_OPTIONS.dup.merge(opts)
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                    notification.delivered = true
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                    notification.delivered_at = time
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                    notification.save!(validate: false) if opts[:persist]
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                  end
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          1
          
                  def mark_batch_delivered(notifications)

                    now = Time.now
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                    notifications.each { |n| mark_delivered(n, now) }

    33. 
          
          
                  end

                  def mark_failed(notification, code, description, time, opts = {})
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                    opts = DEFAULT_MARK_OPTIONS.dup.merge(opts)
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                    notification.delivered = false
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                    notification.delivered_at = nil
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                    notification.failed = true
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                    notification.failed_at = time
        
      41. 
      
        
    41.

      42. 
      
        
    42.

      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                    notification.save!(validate: false) if opts[:persist]
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                  end
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
          
        
      46. 
      
        
    46.

                  def mark_batch_failed(notifications, code, description)

    47. 
          
          
                    now = Time.now
        
      48.

                    notifications.each { |n| mark_failed(n, code, description, now) }

                  def mark_retryable(notification, deliver_after, opts = {})
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                    opts = DEFAULT_MARK_OPTIONS.dup.merge(opts)
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                    notification.delivered = false
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                    notification.delivered_at = nil
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                    notification.failed = false
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                    notification.failed_at = nil
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                    notification.retries += 1
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                    notification.deliver_after = deliver_after
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
          
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                    return unless opts[:persist]
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
          
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                    notification.save!(validate: false)
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                    namespace = Rpush::Client::Redis::Notification.absolute_retryable_namespace
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                    Modis.with_connection do |redis|
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                      redis.zadd(namespace, deliver_after.to_i, notification.id)
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                    end
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                  end
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
          
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          1

                  def pending_delivery_count
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                    Modis.with_connection do |redis|
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                      pending = redis.zrange(Rpush::Client::Redis::Notification.absolute_pending_namespace, 0, -1)
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
                      retryable = redis.zrangebyscore(Rpush::Client::Redis::Notification.absolute_retryable_namespace, 0, Time.now.to_i)

                  def create_gcm_like_notification(notification, attrs, data, registration_ids, deliver_after, app) # rubocop:disable ParameterLists
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                    notification.assign_attributes(attrs)
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                    notification.data = data
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                    notification.registration_ids = registration_ids
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                    notification.deliver_after = deliver_after
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                    notification.app = app
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
                    notification.save!
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                    notification
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
                  end
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
          
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          1
          
                  def retryable_notification_ids
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
                    retryable_ns = Rpush::Client::Redis::Notification.absolute_retryable_namespace
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
          
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                    Modis.with_connection do |redis|
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
                      retryable_results = redis.multi do
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
                        now = Time.now.to_i
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
                        redis.zrangebyscore(retryable_ns, 0, now)
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
                        redis.zremrangebyscore(retryable_ns, 0, now)
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
                      end
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
          
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
                      retryable_results.first
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
                    end
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                  end
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
          
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          1
          
                  def pending_notification_ids(limit)
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
                    limit = [0, limit - 1].max # 'zrange key 0 1' will return 2 values, not 1.
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
                    pending_ns = Rpush::Client::Redis::Notification.absolute_pending_namespace
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
          
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
                    Modis.with_connection do |redis|
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
                      pending_results = redis.multi do
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
                        redis.zrange(pending_ns, 0, limit)
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
                        redis.zremrangebyrank(pending_ns, 0, limit)
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
                      end
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
          
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
                      pending_results.first
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
                    end
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
                  end
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
                end
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
              end
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
            end
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
          end

    lib/rpush/daemon/string_helpers.rb

              module StringHelpers
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          1
          
                def pluralize(count, singular, plural = nil)
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
                  if count == 1 || count =~ /^1(\.0+)?$/
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
                    word = singular
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
                  else
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
                    word = plural || singular.pluralize
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                  end
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
          
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
                  "#{count || 0} #{word}"
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
                end
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
              end
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
            end
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
          end

                APP_ATTRIBUTES_TO_CHECK = [:certificate, :environment, :auth_key, :client_id, :client_secret].freeze
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
          
        
      9.

          1
          
                def self.sync
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
                  apps = Rpush::Daemon.store.all_apps
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
                  apps.each { |app| sync_app(app) }
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
                  removed = AppRunner.app_ids - apps.map(&:id)
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
                  removed.each { |app_id| AppRunner.stop_app(app_id) }
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
          
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                  ProcTitle.update
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                end
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
          
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          1
          
                def self.sync_app(app)
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                  if !AppRunner.app_running?(app)
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                    AppRunner.start_app(app)
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                  elsif (changed_attrs = changed_attributes(app)).count > 0
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                    changed_attrs_str = changed_attrs.map(&:to_s).join(", ")
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
                    log_info("[#{app.name}] #{changed_attrs_str} changed, restarting...")
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
                    AppRunner.stop_app(app.id)
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                    AppRunner.start_app(app)
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                  else
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                    sync_dispatcher_count(app)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                  end
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                end
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
          
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
                def self.sync_dispatcher_count(app)
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                  num_dispatchers = AppRunner.num_dispatchers_for_app(app)
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                  diff = num_dispatchers - app.connections
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                  return if diff == 0
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
          
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                  if diff > 0
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                    AppRunner.decrement_dispatchers(app, diff)
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                    start_stop_str = "Stopped"
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                  else
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                    AppRunner.increment_dispatchers(app, diff.abs)
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                    start_stop_str = "Started"
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                  end
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
          
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                  num_dispatchers = AppRunner.num_dispatchers_for_app(app)
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                  log_info("[#{app.name}] #{start_stop_str} #{pluralize(diff.abs, 'dispatcher')}. #{num_dispatchers} running.")
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                end
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
          
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          1
          
                def self.changed_attributes(app)
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                  APP_ATTRIBUTES_TO_CHECK.select { |attr| attribute_changed?(app, attr) }
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                end
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
          
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          1
          
                def self.attribute_changed?(app, attr)
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                  if app.respond_to?(attr)
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                    old_app = AppRunner.app_with_id(app.id)
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                    app.send(attr) != old_app.send(attr)
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                  else
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                    false
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                  end
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                end
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
              end
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
            end
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
          end
        
      63.

                def self.idle_period
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                  30.minutes
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                end
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
          
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          1
          
                def initialize(app, host, port)
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
                  @app = app
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
                  @host = host
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                  @port = port
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                  @certificate = app.certificate
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                  @password = app.password
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                  @connected = false
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                  @connection_callbacks = []
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                  touch
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                end
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
          
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
                def on_connect(&blk)
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                  raise 'already connected' if @connected
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                  @connection_callbacks << blk
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                end
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
          
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          1
          
                def connect
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                  @ssl_context = setup_ssl_context
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                  @tcp_socket, @ssl_socket = connect_socket
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                  @connected = true
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
          
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                  @connection_callbacks.each do |blk|
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                    begin
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                      blk.call
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                    rescue StandardError => e
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                      log_error(e)
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                    end
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                  end
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
          
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                  @connection_callbacks.clear
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                end
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
          
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          1
          
                def close
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                  @ssl_socket.close if @ssl_socket
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                  @tcp_socket.close if @tcp_socket
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                rescue IOError # rubocop:disable HandleExceptions
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                end
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
          
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          1
          
                def read(num_bytes)
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                  @ssl_socket.read(num_bytes) if @ssl_socket
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                end
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
          
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          1
          
                def select(timeout)
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                  IO.select([@ssl_socket], nil, nil, timeout) if @ssl_socket
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                end
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
          
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          1
          
                def write(data)
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                  connect unless @connected
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                  reconnect_idle if idle_period_exceeded?
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
          
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                  retry_count = 0
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
          
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
                  begin
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                    write_data(data)
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
                  rescue *TCP_ERRORS => e
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                    retry_count += 1
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
          
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
                    if retry_count == 1
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
                      log_error("Lost connection to #{@host}:#{@port} (#{e.class.name}, #{e.message}), reconnecting...")
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                      reflect(:tcp_connection_lost, @app, e)
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
                    end
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
          
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                    if retry_count <= 3
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                      reconnect_with_rescue
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                      sleep 1
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                      retry
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                    else
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
                      raise TcpConnectionError, "#{@app.name} tried #{retry_count - 1} times to reconnect but failed (#{e.class.name}, #{e.message})."
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                    end
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
                  end
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
                end
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
          
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          1
          
                def reconnect_with_rescue
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
                  reconnect
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                rescue StandardError => e
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
                  log_error(e)
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                end
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
          
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          1
          
                def reconnect
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                  close
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                  @tcp_socket, @ssl_socket = connect_socket
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
                end
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
          
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          1
          
                protected
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
          
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          1
          
                def reconnect_idle
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
                  log_info("Idle period exceeded, reconnecting...")
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
                  reconnect
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                end
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
          
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          1
          
                def idle_period_exceeded?
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
                  Time.now - last_touch > self.class.idle_period
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
                end
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
          
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          1
          
                def write_data(data)
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                  @ssl_socket.write(data)
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
                  @ssl_socket.flush
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
                  touch
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
                end
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
          
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          1
          
                def touch
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                  self.last_touch = Time.now
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                end
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
          
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          1
          
                def setup_ssl_context
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                  ssl_context = OpenSSL::SSL::SSLContext.new
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                  ssl_context.key = OpenSSL::PKey::RSA.new(@certificate, @password)
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                  ssl_context.cert = OpenSSL::X509::Certificate.new(@certificate)
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
                  ssl_context
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                end
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
          
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          1
          
                def connect_socket
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
                  touch
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
                  check_certificate_expiration
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
          
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                  tcp_socket = TCPSocket.new(@host, @port)
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
                  tcp_socket.setsockopt(Socket::SOL_SOCKET, Socket::SO_KEEPALIVE, true)
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
                  tcp_socket.setsockopt(Socket::IPPROTO_TCP, Socket::TCP_NODELAY, true)
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
          
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
                  # Linux
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
                  if [:SOL_TCP, :TCP_KEEPIDLE, :TCP_KEEPINTVL, :TCP_KEEPCNT].all? { |c| Socket.const_defined?(c) }
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
                    tcp_socket.setsockopt(Socket::SOL_TCP, Socket::TCP_KEEPIDLE, KEEPALIVE_IDLE)
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
                    tcp_socket.setsockopt(Socket::SOL_TCP, Socket::TCP_KEEPINTVL, KEEPALIVE_INTERVAL)
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
                    tcp_socket.setsockopt(Socket::SOL_TCP, Socket::TCP_KEEPCNT, KEEPALIVE_MAX_FAIL_PROBES)
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                  end
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
          
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
                  # OSX
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
                  if RUBY_PLATFORM =~ /darwin/
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
                    tcp_socket.setsockopt(Socket::IPPROTO_TCP, OSX_TCP_KEEPALIVE, KEEPALIVE_IDLE)
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
                  end
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
          
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
                  ssl_socket = OpenSSL::SSL::SSLSocket.new(tcp_socket, @ssl_context)
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
                  ssl_socket.sync = true
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
                  ssl_socket.connect
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
                  [tcp_socket, ssl_socket]
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
                rescue *TCP_ERRORS => error
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
                  if error.message =~ /certificate revoked/i
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
                    log_error('Certificate has been revoked.')
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
                    reflect(:ssl_certificate_revoked, @app, error)
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
                  end
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
                  raise TcpConnectionError, "#{error.class.name}, #{error.message}"
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
                end
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
          
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          1
          
                def check_certificate_expiration
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
                  cert = @ssl_context.cert
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
                  if certificate_expired?
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
                    log_error(certificate_msg('expired'))
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
                    raise Rpush::CertificateExpiredError.new(@app, cert.not_after)
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
                  elsif certificate_expires_soon?
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
                    log_warn(certificate_msg('will expire'))
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
                    reflect(:ssl_certificate_will_expire, @app, cert.not_after)
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
                  end
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
                end
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
          
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          1
          
                def certificate_msg(msg)
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
                  time = @ssl_context.cert.not_after.utc.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S UTC')
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
                  "Certificate #{msg} at #{time}."
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
                end
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
          
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          1
          
                def certificate_expired?
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
                  @ssl_context.cert.not_after && @ssl_context.cert.not_after.utc < Time.now.utc
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
                end
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
          
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          1
          
                def certificate_expires_soon?
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
                  @ssl_context.cert.not_after && @ssl_context.cert.not_after.utc < (Time.now + 1.month).utc
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
                end
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
              end
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
            end
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
          end
        
      191.
