                  def self.create(notification, access_token)
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
                    body = BadgeRequestPayload.new(notification).to_xml
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
                    uri  = URI.parse(notification.uri)
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
                    post = Net::HTTP::Post.new(
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                      uri.request_uri,
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
                      "Content-Length" => body.length.to_s,
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
                      "Content-Type" => "text/xml",
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
                      "X-WNS-Type" => "wns/badge",
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
                      "X-WNS-RequestForStatus" => "true",

    14.

    15.

                    post

                  end

          1
          
                class Delivery < Rpush::Daemon::Delivery

                  # Oauth2.0 token endpoint. This endpoint is used to request authorization tokens.

          1

          1
          
                  FAILURE_MESSAGES = {
        
      15.

                    400 => 'One or more headers were specified incorrectly or conflict with another header.',
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                    401 => 'The cloud service did not present a valid authentication ticket. The OAuth ticket may be invalid.',

    17.

          1
          
                  def initialize(app, http, notification, batch)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                    @app = app
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                    @http = http
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                    @notification = notification
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                    @batch = batch
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                  end
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
          
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          1
          
                  def perform
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                    handle_response(do_post)
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                  rescue SocketError => error
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                    mark_retryable(@notification, Time.now + 10.seconds, error)
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                    raise
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                  rescue StandardError => error
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                    mark_failed(error)
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                    raise
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                  ensure
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                    @batch.notification_processed
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                  end
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
          
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          1
          
                  private
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
          
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          1
          
                  def handle_response(response)
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                    code = response.code.to_i
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                    case code
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                    when 200
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                      ok(response)
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                    when 401
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                      unauthorized
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                    when 404
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                      invalid_channel(code)
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                    when 406
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                      not_acceptable
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                    when 410
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                      invalid_channel(code)
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                    when 412
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                      precondition_failed
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                    when 503
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                      service_unavailable
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                    else
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                      handle_failure(code)
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                    end
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                  end
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
          
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          1
          
                  def handle_failure(code, msg = nil)
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                    unless msg
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                      msg = FAILURE_MESSAGES.key?(code) ? FAILURE_MESSAGES[code] : Rpush::Daemon::HTTP_STATUS_CODES[code]
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
                    end
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
                    fail Rpush::DeliveryError.new(code, @notification.id, msg)
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                  end
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
          
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          1
          
                  def ok(response)
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
                    status = status_from_response(response)
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
                    case status[:notification]
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
                    when ["received"]
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                      mark_delivered
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
                      log_info("#{@notification.id} sent successfully")
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
                    when ["channelthrottled"]
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                      mark_retryable(@notification, Time.now + (60 * 10))
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                      log_warn("#{@notification.id} cannot be sent. The Queue is full.")
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                    when ["dropped"]
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                      log_error("#{@notification.id} was dropped. Headers: #{status}")
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                      handle_failure(200, "Notification was received but suppressed by the service (#{status[:error_description]}).")
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
                    end
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                  end
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
          
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          1
          
                  def unauthorized
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
                    @notification.app.access_token = nil
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
                    Rpush::Daemon.store.update_app(@notification.app)
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
                    if @notification.retries < MAX_RETRIES
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                      retry_notification("Token invalid.")
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
                    else
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                      msg = "Notification failed to be delivered in #{MAX_RETRIES} retries."
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
                      mark_failed(Rpush::DeliveryError.new(nil, @notification.id, msg))
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                    end
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                  end
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
          
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          1
          
                  def invalid_channel(code, msg = nil)
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
                    unless msg
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                      msg = FAILURE_MESSAGES.key?(code) ? FAILURE_MESSAGES[code] : Rpush::Daemon::HTTP_STATUS_CODES[code]
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                    end
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
                    reflect(:wns_invalid_channel, @notification, @notification.uri, "#{code}. #{msg}")
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
                    handle_failure(code, msg)
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
                  end
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
          
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          1
          
                  def not_acceptable
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
                    retry_notification("Per-day throttling limit reached.")
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
                  end
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
          
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          1
          
                  def precondition_failed
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                    retry_notification("Device unreachable.")
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                  end
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
          
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          1
          
                  def service_unavailable
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
                    mark_retryable_exponential(@notification)
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
                    log_warn("Service Unavailable. " + retry_message)
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                  end
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
          
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          1
          
                  def retry_message
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                    "Notification #{@notification.id} will be retried after #{@notification.deliver_after.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')} (retry #{@notification.retries})."
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                  end
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
          
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          1
          
                  def retry_notification(reason)
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                    deliver_after = Time.now + (60 * 60)
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
                    mark_retryable(@notification, deliver_after)
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                    log_warn("#{reason} " + retry_message)
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
                  end
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
          
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          1
          
                  def do_post
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
                    post = PostRequest.create(@notification, access_token)
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                    @http.request(URI.parse(@notification.uri), post)
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                  end
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
          
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          1
          
                  def status_from_response(response)
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
                    headers = response.to_hash.each_with_object({}) { |e, a| a[e[0].downcase] = e[1] }
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
                    {
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
                      notification:         headers["x-wns-status"],
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
                      device_connection:    headers["x-wns-deviceconnectionstatus"],
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
                      msg_id:               headers["x-wns-msg-id"],
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
                      error_description:    headers["x-wns-error-description"],
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                      debug_trace:          headers["x-wns-debug-trace"]
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
                    }
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
                  end
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
          
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          1
          
                  def access_token
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
                    if @notification.app.access_token.nil? || @notification.app.access_token_expired?
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
                      post = Net::HTTP::Post.new(WPN_TOKEN_URI.path, 'Content-Type' => 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded')
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
                      post.set_form_data(ACCESS_TOKEN_REQUEST_DATA.merge('client_id' => @notification.app.client_id, 'client_secret' => @notification.app.client_secret))
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
          
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
                      handle_access_token(@http.request(WPN_TOKEN_URI, post))
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
                    end
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
          
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
                    @notification.app.access_token
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
                  end
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
          
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          1
          
                  def handle_access_token(response)
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
                    if response.code.to_i == 200
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
                      update_access_token(JSON.parse(response.body))
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
                      Rpush::Daemon.store.update_app(@notification.app)
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
                      log_info("WNS access token updated: token = #{@notification.app.access_token}, expires = #{@notification.app.access_token_expiration}")
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
                    else
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
                      log_warn("Could not retrieve access token from WNS: #{response.body}")
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
                    end
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
                  end
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
          
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          1
          
                  def update_access_token(data)
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
                    @notification.app.access_token = data['access_token']
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
                    @notification.app.access_token_expiration = Time.now + data['expires_in'].to_i
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
                  end
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
                end
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
              end
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
            end
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
          end

                  def self.create(notification, access_token)
        
      6.

                    stringify_keys(notification.data) unless notification.data.nil?
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
          
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
                    if raw_notification?(notification)
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                      RawRequest.create(notification, access_token)

                  def self.stringify_keys(data)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                    data.keys.each { |key| data[key.to_s || key] = data.delete(key) }
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
                  end
        
      30. 
      
        
    30.

                class ToastRequestPayload

                  def initialize(notification)
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
                    @title = notification.data['title'] || ''

    24.

                  def to_xml
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                    launch_string = "" unless @launch
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                    launch_string = " launch='#{CleanParamString.clean(@launch)}'" if @launch
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                    audio_string = "" unless @sound
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                    audio_string = "<audio src='#{CleanParamString.clean(@sound)}'/>" if @sound
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                    "<toast#{launch_string}>
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                      <visual version='1' lang='en-US'>
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                        <binding template='ToastText02'>
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                          <text id='1'>#{CleanParamString.clean(@title)}</text>
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                          <text id='2'>#{CleanParamString.clean(@body)}</text>
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                        </binding>
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                      </visual>
        
      41.

      42.

      43.

                  end

                end
        
      45.

          1
          
                class CleanParamString
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          1
          
                  def self.clean(string)
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                    string.gsub(/&/, "&amp;").gsub(/</, "&lt;") \
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                      .gsub(/>/, "&gt;").gsub(/'/, "&apos;").gsub(/"/, "&quot;")
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                  end
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                end
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
              end
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
            end
        
      54.

          module Rpush

          1
          
              module Wpns

                # http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsphone/develop/ff941100%28v=vs.105%29.aspx
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          1
          
                class Delivery < Rpush::Daemon::Delivery
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          1
          
                  FAILURE_MESSAGES = {
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
                    400 => 'Bad XML or malformed notification URI.',
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
                    401 => 'Unauthorized to send a notification to this app.'
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                  }
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
          
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          1
          
                  def initialize(app, http, notification, batch)
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
                    @app = app
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
                    @http = http
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
                    @notification = notification
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                    @batch = batch
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                  end
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
          
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          1
          
                  def perform
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                    handle_response(do_post)
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                  rescue SocketError => error
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                    mark_retryable(@notification, Time.now + 10.seconds, error)
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                    raise
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
                  rescue StandardError => error
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
                    mark_failed(error)
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                    raise
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                  ensure
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                    @batch.notification_processed
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
                  end
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          1
          
                  private
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
          
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1
          
                  def handle_response(response)
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                    code = response.code.to_i
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                    case code
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                    when 200
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                      ok(response)
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                    when 406
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                      not_acceptable
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                    when 412
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                      precondition_failed
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                    when 503
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                      service_unavailable
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                    else
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                      handle_failure(code)
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                    end
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                  end
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
          
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          1
          
                  def handle_failure(code, msg = nil)
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                    unless msg
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                      msg = FAILURE_MESSAGES.key?(code) ? FAILURE_MESSAGES[code] : Rpush::Daemon::HTTP_STATUS_CODES[code]
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                    end
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                    fail Rpush::DeliveryError.new(code, @notification.id, msg)
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                  end
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          1
          
                  def ok(response)
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                    status = status_from_response(response)
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                    case status[:notification]
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                    when ["Received"]
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                      mark_delivered
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                      log_info("#{@notification.id} sent successfully")
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                    when ["QueueFull"]
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                      mark_retryable(@notification, Time.now + (60 * 10))
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                      log_warn("#{@notification.id} cannot be sent. The Queue is full.")
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                    when ["Suppressed"]
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                      handle_failure(200, "Notification was received but suppressed by the service.")
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                    end
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                  end
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
          
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          1
          
                  def not_acceptable
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                    retry_notification("Per-day throttling limit reached.")
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                  end
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
          
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          1
          
                  def precondition_failed
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
                    retry_notification("Device unreachable.")
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                  end
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
          
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          1
          
                  def service_unavailable
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
                    mark_retryable_exponential(@notification)
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
                    log_warn("Service Unavailable. " + retry_message)
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
                  end
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
          
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          1
          
                  def retry_message
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
                    "Notification #{@notification.id} will be retried after #{@notification.deliver_after.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')} (retry #{@notification.retries})."
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                  end
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
          
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          1
          
                  def retry_notification(reason)
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                    deliver_after = Time.now + (60 * 60)
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                    mark_retryable(@notification, deliver_after)
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
                    log_warn("#{reason} " + retry_message)
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                  end
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
          
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          1
          
                  def do_post
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
                    body = notification_to_xml
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
                    post = Net::HTTP::Post.new(URI.parse(@notification.uri).path, "Content-Length" => body.length.to_s,
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
                                                                                  "Content-Type" => "text/xml",
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                                                                                  "X-WindowsPhone-Target" => "toast",
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
                                                                                  "X-NotificationClass" => '2')
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                    post.body = body
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
                    @http.request(URI.parse(@notification.uri), post)
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                  end
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
          
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          1
          
                  def status_from_response(response)
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
                    headers = response.to_hash
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
                    {
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                      notification:         headers["x-notificationstatus"],
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                      notification_channel: headers["x-subscriptionstatus"],
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
                      device_connection:    headers["x-deviceconnectionstatus"]
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
                    }
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
                  end
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
          
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          1
          
                  def notification_to_xml
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
                    title = clean_param_string(@notification.data['title']) if @notification.data['title'].present?
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
                    body = clean_param_string(@notification.data['body']) if @notification.data['body'].present?
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
                    param = clean_param_string(@notification.data['param']) if @notification.data['param'].present?
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
                    "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\"?>
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                     <wp:Notification xmlns:wp=\"WPNotification\">
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                       <wp:Toast>
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
                         <wp:Text1>#{title}</wp:Text1>
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
                         <wp:Text2>#{body}</wp:Text2>
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
                         <wp:Param>#{param}</wp:Param>
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
                       </wp:Toast>
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                     </wp:Notification>"
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                  end
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
          
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          1
          
                  def clean_param_string(string)
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                    string.gsub(/&/, "&amp;").gsub(/</, "&lt;") \
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                      .gsub(/>/, "&gt;").gsub(/'/, "&apos;").gsub(/"/, "&quot;")
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
                  end
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                end
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
              end
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
            end
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
          end
        
      133.

    lib/rpush/deprecatable.rb

    1. 
          1
          
          module Rpush
        
      2.

          1
          
            module Deprecatable
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          1
          
              def self.included(base)
        
      4.

          2
          
                base.extend ClassMethods

              end
        
      6. 
      
        
    6.

          1
          
              module ClassMethods
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          1
          
                def deprecated(method_name, version, msg = nil)
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                  method_name_as_var = method_name.to_s.tr('=', '_setter_')
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
                  instance_eval do
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
                    alias_method "#{method_name_as_var}_without_warning", method_name
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
                  end
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
                  warning = "#{method_name} is deprecated and will be removed from Rpush #{version}."
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
                  warning << " #{msg}" if msg
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                  class_eval(<<-RUBY, __FILE__, __LINE__)
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                    def #{method_name}(*args, &blk)
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                      Rpush::Deprecation.warn_with_backtrace(#{warning.inspect})
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                      #{method_name_as_var}_without_warning(*args, &blk)
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                    end
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                  RUBY
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                end
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
              end
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
            end
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
          end
        
      25.

              def self.muted
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
                orig_val = Thread.current[:rpush_mute_deprecations]
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
                Thread.current[:rpush_mute_deprecations] = true
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
                yield
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
              ensure
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
                Thread.current[:rpush_mute_deprecations] = orig_val
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
              end

              def self.muted?
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
                Thread.current[:rpush_mute_deprecations] == true
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
              end
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
          
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          1
          
              def self.warn(msg)
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                return if Rpush::Deprecation.muted?
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                STDERR.puts "DEPRECATION WARNING: #{msg}"

              end

              def self.warn_with_backtrace(msg)

                return if Rpush::Deprecation.muted?
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                trace = "\n\nCALLED FROM:\n" + caller.join("\n")
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
                warn(msg + trace)
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
              end

            end

            def self.embed

            def self.shutdown
        
      16.

              Rpush::Daemon.shutdown

              def reopen

              def open_logfile
        
      42.

                FileUtils.mkdir_p(File.dirname(Rpush.config.log_file))
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                log = File.open(Rpush.config.log_file, 'a')
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                log.sync = true
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                log
        
      46.

              end

              def setup_logger(log)
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                if ActiveSupport.const_defined?('BufferedLogger')
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                  logger = ActiveSupport::BufferedLogger.new(log)
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                  logger.auto_flushing = auto_flushing
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
                  logger
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                else
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                  ActiveSupport::Logger.new(log)
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                end
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
              end
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
          
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          1
          
              def auto_flushing
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                if defined?(Rails) && Rails.logger.respond_to?(:auto_flushing)
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                  Rails.logger.auto_flushing

      66.

          1
          
              def log(where, msg, inline = false, prefix = nil, io = STDOUT)
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                if msg.is_a?(Exception)
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                  formatted_backtrace = msg.backtrace.join("\n")
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                  msg = "#{msg.class.name}, #{msg.message}\n#{formatted_backtrace}"
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                end
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
          
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                formatted_msg = "[#{Time.now.to_s(:db)}] "
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
                formatted_msg << '[rpush] ' if Rpush.config.embedded
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
                formatted_msg << "[#{prefix}] " if prefix
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                formatted_msg << msg
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
          
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                log_foreground(io, formatted_msg, inline)
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
                @internal_logger.send(where, formatted_msg) if @internal_logger
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
              end
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
          
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          1
          
              def log_foreground(io, formatted_msg, inline)
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
                return unless io == STDERR || Rpush.config.foreground
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
          
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                if inline
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                  io.write(formatted_msg)
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                  io.flush
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                else
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                  io.puts(formatted_msg)
        
      89. 
      
        
    89.

      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
              end
        
      91. 
      
        
    91.

              def multi_json_load(string, options = {})
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
                # Calling load on multi_json less than v1.3.0 attempts to load a file from disk.
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
                if Gem.loaded_specs['multi_json'].version >= Gem::Version.create('1.3.0')
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
                  MultiJson.load(string, options)
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
                else
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
                  MultiJson.decode(string, options)
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                end
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
              end
        
      11. 
      
        
    11.

              def multi_json_dump(string, options = {})
        
      13.

    14.

              def reflect

              def reflect(name, *args)

              class NoSuchReflectionError < StandardError; end

      5.

          1
          
              REFLECTIONS = [
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
                :apns_feedback, :notification_enqueued, :notification_delivered,
        
      7. 
      
        
    7.

      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          1
          
              DEPRECATIONS = {}
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
          
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          1
          
              REFLECTIONS.each do |reflection|
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          1
          
                class_eval(<<-RUBY, __FILE__, __LINE__)
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                  def #{reflection}(*args, &blk)
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                    raise "block required" unless block_given?
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                    @reflections[:#{reflection}] = blk
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                  end
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                RUBY
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
              end
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
          
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          1
          
              def initialize
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
                @reflections = {}
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
              end
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
          
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          1
          
              def __dispatch(reflection, *args)
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                blk = @reflections[reflection]
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
          
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                if blk
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                  blk.call(*args)
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                  if DEPRECATIONS.key?(reflection)
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                    replacement, removal_version = DEPRECATIONS[reflection]
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                    Rpush::Deprecation.warn("#{reflection} is deprecated and will be removed in version #{removal_version}. Use #{replacement} instead.")
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                  end
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                elsif !REFLECTIONS.include?(reflection)
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                  raise NoSuchReflectionError, reflection
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                end
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
              end
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
            end
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
          end
